premise_source_doc_sentence: James Bryant Conant  (  March 26 , 1893 -- February 11 , 1978  )  was an American chemist , a transformative President of Harvard University , and the first U.S. Ambassador to West Germany .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He became an assistant professor of chemistry at Harvard in 1919 , and the Sheldon Emery Professor of Organic Chemistry in 1929 .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He researched the physical structures of natural products , particularly chlorophyll , and he was one of the first to explore the sometimes complex relationship between chemical equilibrium and the reaction rate of chemical processes .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He studied the biochemistry of oxyhemoglobin providing insight into the disease methemoglobinemia , helped to explain the structure of chlorophyll , and contributed important insights that underlie modern theories of acid-base chemistry .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1933 , Conant became the President of Harvard University with a reformist agenda that involved dispensing with a number of customs , including class rankings and the requirement for Latin classes .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He abolished athletic scholarships , and instituted an `` up or out '' policy , under which scholars who were not promoted were terminated .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: His egalitarian vision of education required a diversified student body , and he promoted the adoption of the Scholastic Aptitude Test  (  SAT  )  and co-educational classes .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: During his presidency , women were admitted to Harvard Medical School and Harvard Law School for the first time .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Conant was appointed to the National Defense Research Committee  (  NDRC  )  in 1940 , becoming its chairman in 1941 .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In this capacity , he oversaw vital wartime research projects , including the development of synthetic rubber , and the Manhattan Project , which developed the first atomic bombs .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: On July 16 , 1945 , he was among the dignitaries present at the Alamogordo Bombing and Gunnery Range for the Trinity nuclear test , the first detonation of an atomic bomb , and was part of the Interim Committee that advised President Harry S. Truman to use atomic bombs on Japan .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After the war , he served on the Joint Research and Development Board  (  JRDC  )  that was established to coordinate burgeoning defense research , and on the influential General Advisory Committee  (  GAC  )  of the Atomic Energy Commission  (  AEC  )  .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: While in this position , he would advise the president against starting a development program for the `` hydrogen bomb '' .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In his later years at Harvard , Conant taught undergraduate courses on the history and philosophy of science , and wrote books explaining the scientific method to laymen .

claim: James Bryant Conant wrote The American High School Today and Slums and Suburbs.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1953 he retired as President of Harvard and became the United States High Commissioner for Germany , overseeing the restoration of German sovereignty after World War II , and then was Ambassador to West Germany until 1957 .
